mapper.select: SELECT * FROM QNA ORDER BY BOARD_REF DESC, BOARD_STEP ASC LIMIT #{startIndex}, #{endIndex}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO QNA (BOARD_NUM, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENTS, BOARD_WRITER, BOARD_DATE, BOARD_HIT, BOARD_REF, BOARD_STEP, BOARD_DEPTH) VALUES (NULL, #{boardTitle}, #{boardContents}, #{boardWriter}, now(), 0, 0, 0, 0)
INSERT INTO QNAFILES (FILE_NUM, ORI_NAME, SAVE_NAME, BOARD_NUM) VALUES (NULL, #{oriName}, #{saveName}, #{boardNum})
mapper.update: UPDATE QNA SET BOARD_REF=#{boardNum} WHERE BOARD_NUM=#{boardNum}
UPDATE QNA SET BOARD_STEP = BOARD_STEP + 1 WHERE BOARD_REF = #{boardRef} AND BOARD_STEP > #{boardStep}
